attributes.action: Stop policing "on the cheap" and recruit Police officers instead of powerless PCSOs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
While PCSOs should be commended for the work they do, they are not Police officers. They do not hold the same powers of arrest, nor are they trained to the high degree of constables.
Get Police back on the beat. We have the best Police service in the world. Let's stop destroying it!
